gov.nist.csd.pm.pdp.engine

Interface Decider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PReviewDecider

    public interface Decider
    Interface for making access decisions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.HashSet<NodeContext> filter(long userID, long processID, java.util.HashSet<NodeContext> nodes, java.lang.String... perms)
      Given a list of nodes filter out any nodes that the given user does not have the given permissions on.

    • Method Detail

      • hasPermissions

        boolean hasPermissions(long userID,
                       long processID,
                       long targetID,
                       java.lang.String... perms)
                throws PMException
        Check if the user has the permissions on the target node. Use '*' as the permission to check if the user has any permissions on the node.
        Parameters:
        targetID - The ID of the target node.
        perms - The array of permission sto check for.
        Returns:
        True if the user has the permissions on the target node, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        PMException

      • listPermissions

        java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> listPermissions(long userID,
                                                    long processID,
                                                    long targetID)
                                             throws PMException
        List the permissions that the user has on the target node.
        Parameters:
        targetID - The ID of the target node.
        Returns:
        The set of operations that the user is allowed to perform on the target.
        Throws:
        PMException

      • filter

        java.util.HashSet<NodeContext> filter(long userID,
                                      long processID,
                                      java.util.HashSet<NodeContext> nodes,
                                      java.lang.String... perms)
                               throws PMException
        Given a list of nodes filter out any nodes that the given user does not have the given permissions on. Filter based on any permissions using '*' as the permission to check for.
        Parameters:
        nodes - The nodes to filter from.
        perms - The permissions to check for.
        Returns:
        A subset of the given nodes that the user has the given permissions on.
        Throws:
        PMException

      • getChildren

        java.util.HashSet<NodeContext> getChildren(long userID,
                                           long processID,
                                           long targetID,
                                           java.lang.String... perms)
                                    throws PMException
        Get the children of the target node that the user has the given permissions on.
        Parameters:
        targetID - The ID of the target node.
        perms - The permissions the user must have on the child nodes.
        Returns:
        The set of NGACNodes that are children of the target node and the user has the given permissions on.
        Throws:
        PMException
